TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON and Mr PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE and live in GPE and GPE , GPE , respectively . The respondent Government are represented by Mr PERSON , Agent , ORG and Law Enforcement .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the ORG preferred a bill of indictment against the applicants , charging them with bribery and other offences .
On DATE the case was assigned to ORG . This court suspended the proceedings on DATE with a view to obtaining ORG ruling on a procedural question .

After the constitutionality proceedings had been terminated on CARDINAL DATE , the bill of indictment was served on the applicants on DATE . In the ensuing proceedings , the applicants were assisted by defence counsel of their choice .
On DATE , CARDINAL and DATE and DATE , ORG held hearings and , on DATE , found the applicants guilty of bribery . They were sentenced to fines .

On appeal , on DATE PERSON held a public hearing , which the applicants did not attend , despite having been properly summoned . Their lawyer was present . The court upheld the applicants’ conviction . In application of section CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the ( Old ) Code of Criminal Procedure , the judgment was served on the applicants’ lawyer on DATE and on the applicants on CARDINAL and DATE , respectively .
